name: kickstarter-rewards-service
description: This is the client & server side code for the rewards/pledges microservice that mocks the rewards component of the Kickstarter site.
author: Zach Ayers

scripts.format: (cd server && npm run format); (cd client && npm run format);
scripts.postinstall: (cd client && npm install); (cd server && npm install);
scripts.lint: (cd server && npm run lint); (cd client && npm run lint);
scripts.sort: (npx sort-package-json); (cd server && npm run sort); (cd client && npm run sort);
scripts.start:database: npm run seed:database && npm run start
scripts.test: (cd server && npm run test); (cd client && npm run test);
